variables.name: BROADCAST_TYPE_UNKNOWN
variables.comment: An unknown nearby broadcast request type.

variables.name: BROADCAST_TYPE_NEARBY_PRESENCE
variables.comment: Broadcast type for advertising using nearby presence protocol.

variables.name: UNKNOWN_TX_POWER
variables.comment: * Tx Power when the value is not set in the broadcast.

variables.name: PRESENCE_VERSION_UNKNOWN
variables.comment: * An unknown version of presence broadcast request.

variables.name: PRESENCE_VERSION_V0
variables.comment:
* A legacy presence version that is only suitable for legacy (31 bytes) BLE advertisements.
     * This exists to support legacy presence version, and not recommended for use.

variables.name: PRESENCE_VERSION_V1
variables.comment:
* V1 of Nearby Presence Protocol. This version supports both legacy (31 bytes) BLE
     * advertisements, and extended BLE advertisements.

variables.name: MEDIUM_BLE
variables.comment: * Broadcast the request using the Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) medium.

methods.name: public int getType()
methods.comment: * Returns the type of the broadcast.

methods.name: public int getVersion()
methods.comment: * Returns the version of the broadcast.

methods.name: public int getTxPower()
methods.comment: * Returns the calibrated TX power when this request is broadcast.

methods.name: public List<Integer> getMediums()
methods.comment:
* Returns the list of broadcast mediums. A medium represents the channel on which the broadcast
     * request is sent.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
methods.comment:
* Writes the BroadcastRequest to the parcel.
     *
     * @hide

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
